description: Protocol for Immunohistochemistry free-floating sections with anti-NeuN antibody for avian tissue.

materials.reagent_name: VECTASTAIN Elite ABC HRP Kit (Peroxidase, Standard)

protocol_affiliation: Universidade Federal do Pará - Instituto Federal do Pará
authors: Nara Gyzely de Morais Magalhães , Cristovam Guerreiro Diniz and Cristovam Wanderley Picanço Diniz

authors_list.name: Nara Gyzely de Morais Magalhães
authors_list.affiliation: Universidade Federal do Pará - Instituto Federal do Pará

authors_list.name: Cristovam Guerreiro Diniz and Cristovam Wanderley Picanço Diniz
authors_list.affiliation: Universidade Federal do Pará - Instituto Federal do Pará

components.data: To remove the excess paraformaldehyde fixative, wash with 0,1 M PBS the sections free-floating at agitation in room temperature for 3 min. (1/3)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: To remove the excess paraformaldehyde fixative, wash with 0,1 M PBS the sections free-floating at agitation in room temperature for 3 min. (1/3)

components.data: To remove the excess paraformaldehyde fixative, wash with 0,1 M PBS the sections free-floating at agitation in room temperature for 3 min. (2/3)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: To remove the excess paraformaldehyde fixative, wash with 0,1 M PBS the sections free-floating at agitation in room temperature for 3 min. (2/3)

components.data: To remove the excess paraformaldehyde fixative, wash with 0,1 M PBS the sections free-floating at agitation in room temperature for 3 min. (3/3)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: To remove the excess paraformaldehyde fixative, wash with 0,1 M PBS the sections free-floating at agitation in room temperature for 3 min. (3/3)

components.data: Incubate with 12% Boric acid (pH =9,0, 70°C) in a water bath for 1 hour.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate with 12% Boric acid (pH =9,0, 70°C) in a water bath for 1 hour.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 4 of NeuN Immunohistochemistry Protocol
source_data.annotation: When the temperature reaches 50°C, using a brush put the sections at the recipient and wait the temperature reaches 70°C and keep at this temperature for 1 hour.
source_data.thread_text: When the temperature reaches 50°C, using a brush put the sections at the recipient and wait the temperature reaches 70°C and keep at this temperature for 1 hour.
source_data.body: When the temperature reaches 50°C, using a brush put the sections at the recipient and wait the temperature reaches 70°C and keep at this temperature for 1 hour.

components.data: Remove the recipients from water bath and wait until it is at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove the recipients from water bath and wait until it is at room temperature.

components.data: Wash the sections with 0,1% PBS/T for 5 minutes. (1/3)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash the sections with 0,1% PBS/T for 5 minutes. (1/3)

components.data: Wash the sections with 0,1% PBS/T for 5 minutes. (2/3)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash the sections with 0,1% PBS/T for 5 minutes. (2/3)

components.data: Wash the sections with 0,1% PBS/T for 5 minutes. (3/3)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash the sections with 0,1% PBS/T for 5 minutes. (3/3)

components.data: Wash the sections with 0,1M PBS for 2 minutes (shaking). (1/3)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash the sections with 0,1M PBS for 2 minutes (shaking). (1/3)

components.data: Wash the sections with 0,1M PBS for 2 minutes (shaking). (2/3)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash the sections with 0,1M PBS for 2 minutes (shaking). (2/3)

components.data: Wash the sections with 0,1M PBS for 2 minutes (shaking). (3/3)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash the sections with 0,1M PBS for 2 minutes (shaking). (3/3)

components.data: Incubate with blocking buffer (Normal Goat Serum Blocking Solution S-1000 10% in 0,3% PBST ) for 12 hours at gentle agitation in refrigeration 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate with blocking buffer (Normal Goat Serum Blocking Solution S-1000 10% in 0,3% PBST ) for 12 hours at gentle agitation in refrigeration 4°C.

components.data: Remove the serum and incubate with Anti NeuN Antibody (MAB377 Anti-NeuN Antibody, clone A60), diluted in 0,3%PBS/T at gentle agitation, overnight at 4°C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove the serum and incubate with Anti NeuN Antibody (MAB377 Anti-NeuN Antibody, clone A60), diluted in 0,3%PBS/T at gentle agitation, overnight at 4°C.

components.data: Wash the sections with 0,1M PBS/T 0,1% for 2 minutes (shaking). (1/3)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash the sections with 0,1M PBS/T 0,1% for 2 minutes (shaking). (1/3)

components.data: Wash the sections with 0,1M PBS/T 0,1% for 2 minutes (shaking). (2/3)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash the sections with 0,1M PBS/T 0,1% for 2 minutes (shaking). (2/3)

components.data: Wash the sections with 0,1M PBS/T 0,1% for 2 minutes (shaking). (3/3)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash the sections with 0,1M PBS/T 0,1% for 2 minutes (shaking). (3/3)

components.data: Incubate with secondary antibody (Biotinylated Goat Anti-Mouse IgG Antibody, BA-9200, Vector Laboratories ) diluted in 0,3% PBS/T at 1:250, for 1 hour at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate with secondary antibody (Biotinylated Goat Anti-Mouse IgG Antibody, BA-9200, Vector Laboratories ) diluted in 0,3% PBS/T at 1:250, for 1 hour at room temperature.

components.data: Incubate with 0,3% hydrogen peroxide (diluted in 0,1 M PBS) for 15 minutes with light shaking.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate with 0,3% hydrogen peroxide (diluted in 0,1 M PBS) for 15 minutes with light shaking.
Wash sections with PBS/T 0,1% for 2 minutes (shaking).(1/3)
Wash sections with PBS/T 0,1% for 2 minutes (shaking).(2/3)
Wash sections with PBS/T 0,1% for 2 minutes (shaking).(3/3)

components.data:
Incubate in VECTASTAIN® ABC KIT solution for 1 hour (total) at 4ºC with light shaking.

First 37,5 µl A + 37,5µl B with 1,88 ml 0,3%PBS/T for 30 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Incubate in VECTASTAIN® ABC KIT solution for 1 hour (total) at 4ºC with light shaking.

First 37,5 µl A + 37,5µl B with 1,88 ml 0,3%PBS/T for 30 minutes.

components.data: Add 13,12 ml 0,3%PBS/T and incubate for 30 more minutes at 4ºC with light shaking.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 13,12 ml 0,3%PBS/T and incubate for 30 more minutes at 4ºC with light shaking.
Wash with 0,1% PBS /T for 5 minutes, (shaking). (1/2)
Wash with 0,1% PBS /T for 5 minutes, (shaking). (2/2)

components.data: Firstly prepare the Solution A by mix 0,006g of Diaminobenzidine (DAB) with 5 ml of distilled water.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Firstly prepare the Solution A by mix 0,006g of Diaminobenzidine (DAB) with 5 ml of distilled water.

components.data: Secondly, prepare the Solution B by mixing 0,250g of Nickel ammonium sulfate with 5 ml de Acetate Buffer pH 6.0.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Secondly, prepare the Solution B by mixing 0,250g of Nickel ammonium sulfate with 5 ml de Acetate Buffer pH 6.0.

components.data: Thirdly mix Solution A and B adding ammonium chloride (0,004g) with 0.020g α-D-Glucose.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Thirdly mix Solution A and B adding ammonium chloride (0,004g) with 0.020g α-D-Glucose.

components.data: Leave the section in this mix of A and B for 5 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Leave the section in this mix of A and B for 5 minutes.

components.data: Incubate sections with solution GND and wait for 3 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate sections with solution GND and wait for 3 minutes.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 30 of NeuN Immunohistochemistry Protocol
source_data.annotation:
After each step remove the remaining solution from the previous step with a pipette, with careful not to damage or lose sections.

Use only sterilized material to minimize the risk of contamination between different antibodies or solutions.

At the end add chlorine to inactivate GND + DAB residual solution before disposal on an appropriate container.
source_data.thread_text:
After each step remove the remaining solution from the previous step with a pipette, with careful not to damage or lose sections.

Use only sterilized material to minimize the risk of contamination between different antibodies or solutions.

At the end add chlorine to inactivate GND + DAB residual solution before disposal on an appropriate container.
source_data.body:
After each step remove the remaining solution from the previous step with a pipette, with careful not to damage or lose sections.

Use only sterilized material to minimize the risk of contamination between different antibodies or solutions.

At the end add chlorine to inactivate GND + DAB residual solution before disposal on an appropriate container.

components.data: Add 0,007g of Glucose-oxidase for each 3ml of GND solution for revelation. Stop revelation when the goal contrast is achieved (use a low gain microscope).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 0,007g of Glucose-oxidase for each 3ml of GND solution for revelation. Stop revelation when the goal contrast is achieved (use a low gain microscope).

components.data: Remove the GDN + Glucose oxidase and wash the sections using 0,1M PBS for 2 minutes with light shaking. (1/3)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove the GDN + Glucose oxidase and wash the sections using 0,1M PBS for 2 minutes with light shaking. (1/3)

components.data: Remove the GDN + Glucose oxidase and wash the sections using 0,1M PBS for 2 minutes with light shaking. (2/3)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove the GDN + Glucose oxidase and wash the sections using 0,1M PBS for 2 minutes with light shaking. (2/3)

components.data: Remove the GDN + Glucose oxidase and wash the sections using 0,1M PBS for 2 minutes with light shaking. (3/3)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove the GDN + Glucose oxidase and wash the sections using 0,1M PBS for 2 minutes with light shaking. (3/3)

components.data: Mount the sections in appropriate gelatinized microscope slides and dry at room temperature for 12 hours or more depending on the mounting medium of choice.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Mount the sections in appropriate gelatinized microscope slides and dry at room temperature for 12 hours or more depending on the mounting medium of choice.
Dihydrate and add the coverslips.
